div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xviij die Augusti anno
ut supra

The quhilk day the ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to Jhon'
Waus to Ansuer to sere Jhone Stirueling' for the haldin fra him be him and
his wyf of ane pendes' of Ane belt

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxijo die Augusti anno
ut supra

The samyn day Alexander Rede become souerte be to keipe Robert evynson'
skathtles for xxiiij s' of annuell pait to Isabell of culan spous' to Alexander of chamer
for certane annuell

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliouos eiusdem xxiij die Augusti anno
ut supra

the quhilk day comperit thomas Watsone sone to Jhone Watsone as
day assignit to him And thar the gret bodely aith' suorne In presens of thom'
narne flessar eftir the deliuerance of ane assise passit tharapon obefor deponit
and declarit that he nor his fadir hed nay scheip pertening to the said thomas
Narne nor knew quhar hed thame nor profit tharoff of the quhilk the
saide Jhone askit certificacion vndir the Seile of caus' quhilk was grantit
him be the aldirman balyeis ande Consale present for the tyme

In the bailye court of Abirdene haldin within the tolbutht of the samyn be
the balyeis Williame blinsele ande Williame of Kintor the xxv day off
august the yer forsaide the said balyeis chargit James of Kintor to reman
within the tolbutht quhile he pait thre barrellis of Salmond to Wat auchnef
And at the commavnd of the said balyeis moryce byssat officiar chargit
the said James to reman within the said tolbutht quhil he pait the saide
thre barrellis

The samyn day the ballieis assignit friday that next cumys to cristy prat to
present Androu brynne befor thame to Ansuer perempturly to Williame
philpe for xl s'

The samyn day William buchane baxter follouit and persevit Jhone gothtrasone
for the wranguis' wedse Reset ande Intrometing' of certane floure reset
be him quhilk the said Jhone denyit And in continent the said action' was
putt tile ane assis' with consent of batht the said partiis of thir personis vndir
writin that is to say Jhone Colysone Wat auchneyf thomas chavmer
Alexander nachty Jhone sanclar Alexander chamer of the schipraw Richerd hill
the fadir Thomas cullane Williame goldsmitht and James of Kennarty

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem penultimo die Au
gusti Anno quo supra

the quhilk day le It was fundyn' and deliuerit be
ane assis' thomas mar forspekar that laurence lousone citenour of Sanct
Androuis sal fulfile and mak pament of the somez' of money contenit in his
obligacion maid obefor to James Dais' skippar of Rostow to Jhone
sclatar procurator to the said James And' atour thai ordanit the said laurenc
and Androu archebald suld suer' the gret bodely ath that the certificacion present
be thame In Jugement was trew And' that the gudis contenit in it that
is to say j barrell of as' / j barrel of tar ix s' scottis demi hundretht and sex
knaphaldis was avay put by the skippar' and his mene and be nay scottis
men' And' this aith' being' suorne thai ordanit the said Jhon' sclater
to pay thame the saidis gudis In the skiparis name And' tharefter the said
laurence and Androu deponit the said aith' according' to the deliueranc
of the said assis' Alsua it was deliuerit be the said assise that
quhat tyme the saidis laurence and Androw bringis sufficient certifica
cion that the barrell of Ry meile clamyt be thame was le takin'
be the said skippar and disponit in his vs' thane the said Jhone
sal pay the said barrel of meile to the saidis laurence and Androw
Curia balliouorum tenta in pretorio primo die septembris Anno ut supra

the quhilk day it was fundyne ande deliuerit be ane suorne assis' tho
mas prat forspekar that Androu Wentone and thome of mar sal pas'
to giddir to covnt and Rekning betuix this and friday that next cumis anent
the parting' of the malt that come hayme with thaim in thar last Rais' And
thareftir the said Androw sal cum befor the balyeis ande make gude fatht that
the saide thomas mar has alsmekile as he hed of the said malte
hud hudlike And quhat that hapinnis to be optenit fra Androw Wode
salbe partyt amange the merchandis hud hudlike And quhat that wantis
sal want amang thaim hude hudlik

The samyn day it was deliuerit and fundin be ane assis' thomas prat forspekar
that peirhandbow sale deliuer to Jhone Westlande j pety quartar of Salte
heir Ande gif the saide Jhone cane preyf that copyne Andrees' wyf
gaf him siluere for ane vthir pety quartar of Salt thane he sal gif the saide
Jhone Redy money for ane pety quartar of Salt alsmekile as he tukis fra
vthiris now in hand' for the pety quartar / within the tovne of Abirdene but aventour
within tene dais eftir certificacion be present that the said gudwyff pait him the
said money And the said peirhandbow sal fynde souerte ande caucion to the
fulfillinge and kepin' of the samyn
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio quinto die Septembris Anno Domini ut supra

the quhilk day Williame of Kintor ane of the balyeis grantit that he
leit the malt to borghe' to James of Kintor that was arestit at the
Instance of the factouris of Thome hobson' Inglisman

the samyn day Jhone fechat folouit Katerine barde be ane borghe' for the wrang
uys' withhaldin fra him of tua siluer beltis iij s' ix d' of Siluer a par of cardis
a par of wole scheris a tepat a schet and j couering with vthir gudis quhilkis scho
denyit And thareftir the said actione was put tile ane assis' quhilkis riplie
avisit the gret aitht suorne deliuerit and fand' be the moutht of Jhone menyeis
forspekar the said Katerine quyt of the wranguis' withhaldin' of the said gudis And
the saide Jhone fechat was in Amerciament of the court for the wranguis' borghe' strekin'
apone the saide Katerine And atour thai fande the saide Jhone fechat avand' tua
markis and xiiijor d' apone the said beltis to the said Katerine

the samyn day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne of Culan forspekar
that Alexander Rede sal gif the copy of his emissine bile of waring' that he send in
flandris to Jhone portar ande Jhone portar sal mak j bile of cowrt and Rekning
to the saide Alexander this day aucht dais and fulfill al thingis contenit in his emissine
bile except' the wyne and the wade And gif the saide Jhone bringis sufficente
preyf be this day aucht days that he mycht nocht get wyne nor wade to
by for siluer siclik as was contenit in the said emissine letter thane the forsaide
Alexander sale haue his siluer in flandris And falyeing' tharof the saide preyfe the
saide Jhone' sal fulfille the said bile of waring' in ale thingis and gif him sic waring
as it proportis for thai fande his aventour gane

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos sexto die Septembris
Anno ut supra

Eodem die gilbertus Waus de many fecit constituit et creauit
Alexandrum rede suum procuratorem legittimum ad prosequendum sponsam Jacobi Kintor
pro firmis domus sue et cetera promittens de Rato et grato cum omnibus terminis
solitis et consuetis

the samyn day Alexander prat was conuikit be ane assise for strubulance of
Duncan lamyntone And the said Duncan conuikit for strubulance of the saide
Alexander And atour it was deliuerit be the saide assis' Alexander menyeis forspekar
that the saide alexander prat sal gif j li' of wax to the haly blud licht
And quhilk of thame that strubulis vthir and beis conuikit tharof sal pay
xx s' to Sanct Nicholas' werk vnforgevin in tyme to cum
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die Septembris anno ut supra

the quhilk day Williame blinsele the bailye assignit to Alexander
chamer of the schipraw Dauid galichtlys vnlaw that he was in for the
wranguis' borghe' strekin apone the saide Alexander obefor for certane wyn'
that the saide Williame was avand' to the saide Alexander

the samyn day the balyeis with avis' ande consale of the haile Court assig
nyt this day xv dais as day of peremptour to William moire to
present bringe ande schaw befor thame In Jugement ale evidentis Richtis
and documentis that he has ande wile vs' anent the lande of Jhon' moir'
sone and ayr of vmquhile Androu moire liand' in the gallougate
betuix the lande of vmquhile William rollande one the southt part
Ande the lande of Richerde of culane one the Northt debatabile
betuix sere Jhone of ruthirfurde aldirman procurator to the saide Jhone
one that ane part Ande the saide Williame one that vthir part with consent
of batht the saide partiis that the Richt of the samyn may be seyne befor
the Consaile as day of peremptour

the samyn day the aldirman and Williame blinsele the bailye chargit
Williame of Kintor to present ande bringe before thaim in Jugement one
friday that next cumis Jhone stewinsone or ellis his gudis to the avale
of sevin li' ande mak penny of thaim to pay copin Andres' Ande
in likuis' to entir thome of chamer litstar befor thaim in the tolbutht
the saide day or ellis his gudis to the quantite of ix li' to pay
Copin Andres' or his procuratouris becaus' the saide somes was optenit
befor him

Eodem die Alexander Jhonsone burgensis de fores et Isabella brody sua sponsa
fecerunt constituerunt et ordinarunt Dauid menyeis Juniorem magistrum Andream
cadiow et Andream Kymdy coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores legittimos ad
petendum exigendum et recipidiendum a Johanne fechat tres pecias auri le
levis et de Receptis acquitand' Et si necesse fuerit eundem Johannem prose
quend' promittens de Rato et grato cum omnibus clausulis ad procuratorium
necessariis et oportunis in vberiore forma procuratorij

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos decimo die septembris anno
quo supra

The samyn day the balyeis with consent of the haile court assignit
the xi day of this instant September' to James of Kintor to comper
befor thaim and ansuer to ane borghe' strekit apone him be Alexander Rede as
procurator to thomas hobsone as day of peremptour' for the wranguis'
haldin of vij barrellis of Salmonde to gude covnt and rekning fra
him becaus' the saide Thomas is ane alienar'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xio die septembris Anno
Domini et cetera octuagesimo octauo

Eodem die comparuerunt prepositus ballivi et communitas infrascripti dicti burgi'
publice premunit' pone dicti burgi per limites vicos et plateas preemnte preeminite pro
certis causis Racionabilibus vtilitatem dicti burgi concernentibus quibus vero congregatis
et presentibus honorabiles virj Alexander menyes Robertus blindseil Dauid menyes alexander
Reid' Johannes collison' et Andreas culane senior pro se et suis consortibus videlicet
Alexandro de camera et Jacobo leslie tunc absentibus commisserij alias electj ad asse
dandum terras et piscarias dictj burgj graui querela dictis preposito et ballivis
exposuerunt qualiter alias citati per litteras suppremi domini nostri Regis ad comparendum
coram sua serenissima maiestate ac dominis et Nobilibus sui consilij Apud Edinburgum
aut alicubj vbi ipsos Residere contigerit xvo die mensis octobris proximo futuro
ad Instanciam thome fiff Dauid symson' magistri Andre cadiow et suorum complicum
nomine et ex parte communitatis prefati burgi ad videndum et audiendum generalem assida
cionem certarum terrarum et piscariarum dicti burgj alias per ipsos factam annualarj destruj et
cassari ut asseretur prout in eosdem plenius continetur qua propter dictos prepositum et balliuos
humiliter Requisierunt ad petendum interrogandum et Requirendum a dicta communitate si ad
Impetracionem dictarum litterarum summonicionis taliter inportat' super ipsos et extunt consen
sisset seu consensum aut assensum prebuissent Et si expensas super prosecucione et
calumpnacione dictarum personarum sic summonitarum facere in premissis voluissent quibus vero
Requestibus dicti prepositus et balliuj merito inclinatj secutj sibi ex eorum officio incubuit diligentem
Inquesicionem per Willelmum blindseil vnum balliuorum dicti burgi ab vniversis et singulis personis
Subsciptis corpus eiusdem burgi Representantibus singillatim diuisim circulariter et per se
fieri fecerunt pro veritatis premissorum declaracione quorum nomina sequuntur videlicet thomas
branche Willelmus gareauche senior Andreas Kymdy Dauid matheson' Willelmus portar
Alexander angussone thomas mar Walterus auchneiff Murdaycus glenmaill
winge Ricardus culane gilbertus morisone Alexander nachty Johannes stewart
Willelmus cryne Ricardus hill senior Willelmus futhes Alexander sanquher' Willelmus
gareauche Junior Willelmus goldsmyth Magnus Wormet Richardus hill Junior symon
gardin Walterus thomson' Johannes blak Willelmus nicholson' Donaldus Stratha
chin Andreas Watsone Willelmus moir Junior Willelmus gareauche Junior Johannes tuli
boy Johannes Rogertsone Thomas hatmakar Dauid galichtly Willelmus cowpar Ro
bertus buquhane Andreas andirsone clerk georgius brovne Dauid Robertsone
Johannes andirsone in grene Jacobus Strathachin Andreas morison' Walterus
Mernes henricus bavne Willelmus Ranisone Alexander Ranisone Johannes Stevin Thomas
Sadlar Patricius grige Willelmus tulideff Johannes grige Dauid gichtane
Johannes chapman Jacobus Kennerty Junior Willelmus cummyne Thomas menyes
Johannes brogane Patricius Reide Andreas nicholsone Johannes Waus Thomas
Narne patricius clerk Ricardus Scot patricius andirson' Thomas chamer alexander
tailyor Dauid mar thomas Waus Johannes porter Robertus Kyntor Willelmus
Kyntor Johannes Westlande Johannes Kyntor Willelmus blindseil Willelmus vmfray
Thomas chamer Alexander traill Johannes chamer Willelmus burges Duncanus
Straloche magister Willelmus vmfray Andreas Wentone Willelmus lynton' Robertus
Smytht Jacobus Kennerty senior Dauid prat Alexander Rollande Alexander chamer de
ken Lindesay herraulde Moricius bissait Johannes tailyour' Willelmus Dauidsone
Willelmus Nory Andreas lamyntovn' gilbertus Riburne Thomas gardin' Thomas
chamer tinctor Andreas Ranison Johannes buchane Richardus crafurd thomas
smyth Johannes lammynton' georgius Willelmus symson' Johannes Waus many Willelmus
leis Johannes sclater Willelmus sprovnt Andreas culan' senior gilbertus gareauche
Willelmus giffard' henricus hourum Adam heruy Johannes bogy Thomas quhit et
alexander angussone Junior Quibusquidam personis sic interrogatis et circulariter
Inquesitis Impetracionem dictarum litterarum et expensis desuper fiendis summonicionis
prefate persone ac ipsorum quilibet expresse denegarunt Nec ad easdem assensum
seu consensum prebuerunt Et vlterius interrogatis de prosecucione earundem litterum
et expensis desuper fiendis vt premittitur unanimiter expensas super calumpnia
et prosecucione dictarum litterarum in promissis Recusarunt Insuper dicti commisserij
et persone sic citatj se promptos et paratos obtulerunt ad subeundum assise
prouidorum virorum suorum conuicinorum Insuspectorum coram suis preposito et ballivis
tanquam suo Judice ordinario penes dictam assedacionem terrarum et piscariarum
alias factam et quascumque alias causas que contra ipsos per dictos thomam Dauid
magistrum Andream et suos complices obiti possunt Et ad maiorem premissorum
verificacionem Sigillum commune dictj burgi prefata communitas appendj consensierunt
Coram hiis Testibus domino Johanne Ruthirfurde milite que preposito dicti burgi domino
Dauid Waus vicario de banff Dominis alexandro vocat et Roberto stiruelinge
Andrea ettall capellanus et magistro gilberto collison' cum multis aliis

The samyn day James Kintor grantit and oblist him to bring ane sufficient acquitanc
fra thome hobson inglisman of ale salmonde aucht to him and follouit be Alexander red and
vthiris his procuratouris and present it to thaim betuix this and the next martymes And falyeinge
tharof he oblist him to pay tham alsmekile for Ilkan barrel salmond that he is avand
as it gevis and fische ar sauld' within the said burghe' one the hieast price

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xijo die septembris
anno quo supra

The quhilk day the balyeis continevit the oppining' of
the previs lede be Jhone portar of the wade and wyne clamit be
Alexander Rede quhile to morne for waknes of the court but preiudice
tile ony party

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiijo septembris
anno quosupra

the quhilk day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane
assise Alexander chamer of murchile forspekar that Jok gregory sal pay to
Alexander menyeis the smale custum of the gudis that he brocht hame
now out of Danskin' becaus' the gudis was fundin his avne

The samyn day the aldirman ande balyeis with consent of the haile
Court assignit to Jhone fechat yongar to preif in penny and
pennyworthtis that he has pait the iij said levis of gold that he
resauit in flandris of Jhone' mecheis behalf within xl dais
And falyeing' tharof the saide Jhone sale pay the said iij levis
to the procuratouris of Alexander Jhonsone and Isabell brody

Eodem die Alexander Rede deuenit plegius legalis quod omnes
Carnifices nostri erunt Indempnes pro henrico byrne aliter
quam per viam Juris Necnon quod Idem henricus de cetero non
Ibit ad montes foristallando burgum et dictus henricus
per ostensionem manus obligavit se fide media ad releuandum
dictum Alexandrum de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos die septembris
anno quosupra

The quhilk day the aldirman and balyies char
git ale the baxtaris to bak the Ry bred in penny brede and tua
penny bredis the penny layf of vnboutit s ry weyand' xvi
vnce and the tua penny laif xxxij vnce And the layff of boutit
ry sale wey xxvij vnce vndir the payne of eschetis of thar brede

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxij die
aug Septembris anno quo supra

the samyn day William philp grantit
him dettour to thome of mar for x s' of fraucht for James steuart
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The samyn day cristy prat come dettour be his hande to pay xl s'
to Williame philp this day xv dais or ellis entir Androw brynne
in the tolbutht befor the aldirman ande balyeis this day xv dais
but ony langar delay or exception as day or peremptoure

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit Wednisday that next cumis
to Dauid galichtly to ansuer to Arthur forbes of Reres for the wrang
uis' haldin fra him of iiijor chaldir of atis xj chaldir of beire

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxiijo die septem
bris anno ut supra

add.foreign: continuacio inter prepositum et W moir

div.p:
The quhilk day the balyeis for waknes of the court
has continevit the action' debatabile betuix sere Jhone ruthirfurde aldirman
procurator for Jhone moir sone and ayr to vmquhile Androu moire
one that ane part Ande William moir one that vthir part anent ane lande
debatabile betuix the saide partiis quhile the law day next eftir michel
mes next to cum in siclik strintht force and'and' overwrites 'nor'. effect as it is now witht
thar avne consent but preiudice of ony party

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxviij die sep
tembris anno quo supra

The quhilk day the balyeis assignit monunday
cum viij dais to gilbert moreson to Ansuer to Jhone malisone and
tile ane borghe strekit be him for the wranguis' haldin fra him of vij
s' and iiij d' of the rest of ane bonat

The quhilk day the balyeis assignit monunday cum viij dais to gilbert
moreson to Ansuer to Ane borghe' strekit be Dauid spens for the wrang
uys' haldin fra him of ane barrele of Salmond' and to suer in his avne action

the samyn day Jhone malison' grantit him avande j barrele of Salmonde
to Richerde hile yongar eftir the tenour of ane obligacion producit and schavyne
in Jugement quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
law

div.head: commissarii ad parleamentum
div.p:
Primo die octoberis dominus Johannes ruthirfurde prepositus Dauid menyeis Johannes
Knollis et georgius eduardson et Alexander rede electi fuit commissarii ad proximum
parleamentum

Eodem die thomas de camera deuenit plegius legalis quod Andras lammynton et Duncanus
lammyntone erunt Indempnes pro Alexandro prat aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas
mar deuenit plegius legalis pro Andrea lammyntone et Andreas Wentone pro
Duncano lammyntone quod dictus Alexander prat erit Indempnis pro eis aliter que per
viam Regis

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio Sexto
die mensis octoberis Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo octauo

Quo die Dauid menyeis Junior electus fuit in officium prepositure pro
annuo Instante prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die thomas mar thomas de Camera Andreas branche et Andreas
Cullane senior electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die moricius byssat Duncanus straloche thomas Jamesone et
Alexander allansone electi fuerunt seriandi prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die statutum fuit et ordinatum per prepositum balliuos Consules et communi
tatem quod si dicti seriandi aut aliquis ipsorum conuictus fuerit pro non execucione
sui officij erunt depriuati et seclusi ab officio et alij de nouo electo
et dicti officiarij Reddent ac ipsorum quilibet Reddet omnes summas quas pro
suis seruicius receperunt disponend' pro vtilitate dicti burgi et notant' obligaciones
Natalis Domini

The samyn day Thomas Jamesone seriand at the commavnd of the balyeis chargit
Alexander of mar be his wande to Remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait tua
barrellis of Salmonde to sere Williame of Knollis or his procuratouris for James
of J leslie quhilikis he come souerte for and grantit him souerte for the samyn obefor

Eodem die Jacobus leslie intrauit se coram ballivis ad releuandem Alexandrum
mar de duabus barrellis salmonum clamatis per dominum Willelmum Knollis
et Consequent' dictus thomas Jamesone seriandus de madato mandato prepositi et
balliuorum precepit et onerauit dictum Jacobum leslie per virgam suam ad remandendum
infra pretorium donec releuet prefatum alexandrum de dictis duabus barrellis salmonum

Eodem die Alexander gray Alexander angousone et Johannes mare electi fuerunt et
Jurati ad sedendum vna cum Curato ad videndum audiendum et considerandum
Compotum summe per Robertum huchouson in suo feodo Recept' et carenciam
eiusdem ac ad prouidendum pro solucione eiusdem Robertus crage et Willelmus futhes adduntur
et cetera

The quhilk day Jhone malison presentit ane borghe' strekit be him apon
Androw branche in Duncan stralochis hande seriande for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of xvi s' g' and viij g' of vsual money of flandris And the balyeis
assignit this day xv dais to the saide Androu to ansuer to the saide
borghe as the day

the samyn day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Jhone mali
sone to ansuer to ane borghe' strekit apon him be Androw branche
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xiiij s' and vi d' scottis in morice
byssatis handis seriande

The samyn day Will moir eldar comperit befor the aldirman and balyeis
to schaw his Richtis that he wald ws' anent the lande of vmquhile
Androu moire his brodir liand in the Gallougate debatabile betuix
him one that ane part And sere Jhone rutherfurd of tarlane knicht one
that vthir part procurator for Jhone moire sone to vmquhil the saide Androw
the quhilk knicht producit and schew ane Instrument of procuratory off
the said Jhon' moire and ane vthir Instrument of the sesin brekin of the sad
land be the saide Jhone gevin obefor to the said William be thomas fyf
bailye vndir the manuale subscripcion of sere Robert leis public notar quhilkis
Instrumentis being' opinly rede And the akis maid betuix thaim tharapon' the
aldirman and balyeis askit the richtis of the saide partiis to be schavin' to tham
eftir the tenor of the akis maid tharapon' obefor And the said William
saide and allegit him possessour of the saide gronde and lande quhilkis the
saide sere Jhone ruthirfurde denyit ande askit declaracion of ane assise
vnsuspek to be suorne tharto to the quhilkis the saide Williame walde nocht
assent And' thareftir the aldirman and balyeis chargit the said partiis to
Remoyf that thar mycht avys' in the said mater with the consaile quhat w
done in the saide thingis Ande the saide sere Jhone ruthirfurde producit and schew
his evidentis ande Richtis that he hede and wald vs' anent the said lande
and the saide Williame was chargit to remane ande schaw his Richtis
that he walde vs' anent the saide lande eftir the tenor of the akis maide obefor
Ande thareftir the aldirman ande the Consaile being' in the consailhous' avisand'
In the saide matir for ministracion of Justice to batht the said partiis the saide
Williame being' chargit to remane passit avay Inobedientlie ande come
nocht agane Ande thareftir the aldirman ande consaile chargit thomas cha
mer balye to pas' with the saide knicht to the saide lande ande charge the
tennendis Inhabitantis the samyn to obey and ansuer him as procuratour to the
saide Jhone moire quhile thai saw mair Richtis tharanent

Eodem die prepositus ballivi Consules et communitas exonerarunt et quieteclamarunt
dominum Johannem rutherfurde de omnibus bonis per ipsum receptis in suo offficio prepositure
anno elapse hac condicione ipso domino Johanne portante et sibi presentate vnam suffi
cien' acquitan' quod dictus burgus erit liber et Indempnis de omnibus firmis
et pensionibus dicti annj vltimi elapsi et Redden' vnum Nobile aureum de rosa

Eodem die gilbertus moreson vocatus ad respondendum plegio super ipsum per Johannem mali
son porrecto pro iniusta detencione ab eo summe vij s' et iiij d' monete scocie de resta
vnius birreti non comparuit quare precipitur Duncano straloche seriando ad capiendum
disctrictum a dicto gilberto et premunire eum ad comparendum in proxima Curia legaliter
secundum diem processus

Eodem die gilbertus moreson primo die vocatus ad respondendum plegio super ipsum per David
spens porrecto per pro iniusta detencione ab eo vnius barrelle salmonum non comparuit quare
precipitur Duncano straloche seriando capere vnum districtum et premunire eum ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus

Eodem die dominus Robertus stirueling capellanus ac procurator capelle beate Katerine
virginis accedens as barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et viij d' si debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vivo Nauium inter terram quondam Duncani byrs' ex austra
li et terram henrici forbes ex orie boreali ad quam terram accedens Nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Johanne lindoris Juniore Johanne ymlow et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die Willelmus futhes accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno ann
uo Redditu sex s' sibi debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium
inter terram quondam Duncani byrs' ex australi ex vna et terram henrici for
bes ex boreali partibus ex altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia
tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo andree Johanne chapman et
Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die dominus Alexander vocat Collector et capellanus ecclesie Abirdonensis et
eo Nomine accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo reddi
tu x s' sibi et dictis capellanis debit' de dicta terra vasta Jacente in vico
nauium inter terram quondam Duncani byrs' ex australi et terram henrici forbes
ex boreali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die
huius processus Testibus Johanne Watson Johanne bogy et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die dominus Alexander vocat capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Nini
anj accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et viij d' sibi et dicto
altari debit' de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in le gastraw
inter terram hered' quondam Andree baxtar ex australi et terram Johannis myle
ex boriali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Andrea mureson et Andrea Roberto evynson et tho
ma Jameson' seriando

Eodem die Dominus matheus Nicholson capellanus ac procurator altaris beati petri
apostolorum principis accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu
vi s' sibi et dicto altari debit' de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum
in le gastraw inter terram hered' quondam Andree baxtar ex australi et terram Johannis
myl ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus Andrea mvreson et Roberto evynson ac thome Jameson
seriando

Eodem die magistro Andreas cadiow accedens ad barram protesta
tus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vi s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit' de terra
quadem Jacente in le gastraw hukirstarraw inter terram Dauid hile ex orientali
et terram Patricij Coupar ex occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia tanquam
primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne barbour Andrea bety et Alexandro allanson
seriando

Eodem die dominus Willelmus Crukschank capellanus ac procurator
altaris beati Duthaci infra eccleasiam beati Nicholaij de Abirdene accedens ad barram
protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu quinque solidorum de quadam terra vasta sibi debit'
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome mar ex australi et
terram thome prat ex orientali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Andrea muresone Roberto ewynsone et thoma Jamesone
seriando

Curia gilde Burgi de abirdene terra in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis octoberis Anno Domini et cetera lxxxviijo

div.head: Commune Consilium
div.p:
Alexander chavmer de murchile
Dominus Johannes Ruthirfurde
Alexander menyeis
Robertus blinsele
Jacobus leslie
Alexander Rede
Alexander chamer Junior
Johannes Colisone
Johannes Culane
Johannes Knollis
Thomas Prat
Andreas murray senior
Walterus Auchneyf
Willelmus blinsele
Willelmus Kyntor
Johannes menyeis
Willelmus gareache senior
Robertus Crage
Willelmus futhes
Johannes grige

div.head: Appreciatores Carnium electos pro Anno instante
div.p:
Symon gardin Andreas philp Jacobus andree Dauid spens thomas
gardner Willelmus moire Junior Johannes Duwarde Donaldus strachin
et Johannes blak

The samyn day the aldirman and balyeis with avys' of the haile court ordanit Wile
nicholson put al the gudis that he clamis as ayrschip fra Williame Nicholson James of
Kennarty in writ ande deliuer the Copy of it to the said James or evin
And' thai assignit monunday cum aucht dais to the saide James to ansuer
to the saide William Nicholsone tharanent as day of peremptoure

Eodem die Symon gardin cum domino Johanne ruthirfurde suo prelocutore offerebat
se prompt' et parat' ad soluendum Johanni fechat seniori tres li' monete scocie
in auro et argento Ibidem munerat' de Resta maiorum summe pro quadam terra secundum
tenorem sue obligacionis desuper confect' protestan' et cetera

Eodem die Walterus auchneywe exoneratus fuit de officio ballivi quia in suis
arduis negociis laboraturus fuit extra burgum et Regnum

the samyn day Alexander Rede Inquerit at Jhone Colison gif he or ony that
passit one the assise betuix the merchandis and mastir Androw Cadiow wald
mak procuratouris to the defens' of the said summonce and he ande his fallouis
wald makyn costis

The samyn day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane assise Alexander Gray forsp
ekar anent the clame of Adriane of the feir for his sterismannis fee out
of Scotland in Danskin fra Dauid matheson and his furing' And anent
the clame of peirbrandis and clays fe hiyr and furing' that the said thre
personis sale haue for euere crovne scottis that the said Dauid was avande
thame in Danskin xxxij scott becaus' the lordis of Danskin ordanit the
saide Dauid to gif thame Certane money to covnt and Rekning quhile
thai come in scotlande And gif thai resauit mar' than he was avande
thame thar sale Allow to him in scotland vj d' for Ilkan scot of thar
hyir hamvart in scotlande Alsua it was deliuerit that the saide Adriane
sale haue for his sterismannis furing aucht barrellis fracht free And perbrand'
iiijor barrelis fre And clays nay thing becaus' he laid nay thing in the schipe
Alsua thai ordanit the said Dauid Adriane perbrand and clays to pas' to
covnt and Rekning and the saide Dauid to pay al the fee that he was avand'
the quhilk he offerit hyme Reddy to pay in continent And the bailyeis assignit
thame' to compeir one the morne thareftir befor thame' to Rasaiff the said money be
the handis of the said Dauid

The samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assise Alexander gray forspekar that Androw
Wenton' sal pay to ellyne the videw of alexander hay ane kyrtil of Reid menys And'
xx s' of siluer And gif the said androu preuys that the said ellyne hecht him hir
tenement that Jhone' Wormet now has bocht fre of annuell than he salbe quyt of the xx s'
the quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xio die mensis octobris

quo die
comparuit agnes mar sponsa andree andirson' coram Andrea branche et andrea culan'
duobus balliuorum et magnum corporale prestitit Juramentum non choact' seduct' s nec aliquo
modo circumuenta nominatis sacrosanctis dei ewangeliis quod spontaneo libito consensit alienacionem
vnius terre Jacentis infra dictum burgum in vico caustri inter terram thome prat ex orientale ex
et terram Johannis culane ex occidentali et terram Robertj buchane ex boriali et communem viam
Regiam uersus austrum per dictum sponsum suum eidem thome faciendum Necnon consensit vendicionem
vnius annuj Redditus quatuor marcarum de dicta terra ipsius thome per prefatum sponsum
meum alienand' eidem thome prat et cetera Testibus thoma de camera Johanne Kyntor thoma
gardinar villelmo stile domino Richerdo andirson' capellano Ricardo baxtar et alexandro alanson'
seriando

The samyne day Jhone Wormet grantit him to Releiff and free Androu Wenton'
of ane kyrtil of Reid menys optenit on' him be ellyne the videw of alexander hay

The samyne day it was preuit be sufficient witnes producit and suorn' that Androw
Wentone wes quyt of tuenty s' clamyt be the videw of alexander hay and contenit in ane
ake maid obefor

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiij die octobris Anno quo
supra

the samyne day the balyeis continewit the dovme of the land processit be
the minister of the trinite freris quhil this day aucht daus and ordanit Androw lamynton'
to be warnyt tharto peremptourly

Eodem die balliuj assignarunt Relicte quondam gilberti Waus crastinum diem ad Respondendum
Johannem Waus peremptorie penes bona per ipsum Jure hereditario clamat' et copiam cedule
peticionis sue sibi decreuerunt suis expensis et cetera

Eodem die balliui assignarunt crastinum diem Johannem fechat ad Respondendum plegio super eum
per Johannem Waus porrecto peremptorie pro iniusta intromissione et distructione vnius cimbe
sibi pertinentis ac pro vno capitali videlicet le sellat

Eodem die henricus tulideff allutarius adiudicatur in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem
pro forestallacione burgi emendo coria et ad emendandum ut Jura volunt et de cetero euitare

Eodem die andreas branche solempniter protestauit quod deposiciones patricij Reid' et Johannis
galespy alias ad Instanciam Johannis malison' contra ipsum ut quadam causa peccuniaria xvi s'
et viij g' monete flandrie product' non cedant sibi in preiudicium ex et pro eo quod ipse
asseruit se non presentem citatum nec vocatum ad videndum et audiendum huiusmodi testes
iuratos eciam quia product' erant ante tempus debitum et pro aliis causis et
Racionibus tempore et loco oportunis allegandis et cetera

Eodem die balliuj cum consilio curie assignarunt Dauid gichtan ad Respondendum
plegio super ipsum per villelmum moir Juniorem porrecto pro non complemento sue cedule
compoti feria sexta xvij die mensis octobris tanquam die peremptorio
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xiiijo die octobris Anno ut supra

quo die balliuj cum consilio curie assignarunt villelmo gareache Juniorj ad Respondendum plegio
super ipsum porrecto per thomam hatmakar pro iniusta detencione ab eo dimidii laste
victualium videlicet le corne in feria sexta xvijo die octobris instantis tanquam die peremptorio
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvto die mensis octobris Anno ut supra

The quhilk day Jhone' Wormet folowit Dauid theman and his wiff for the wran
us' takin away of his petis and eldinge vndir the nicht be ane broche strekit in
the hand of Morice bissait seriande the quhilk the said Dauid denyit And incontinent
the said action' wes put til ane assise of thir personis vndir writin Dauid menyes
elder' Williame' Kyntor Androu Wenton' Jhone' menyeis alexander sanquhor
Jhone' portar Jhone' chepman Williame' goldsmyt henry hovrum alexander angusson'
Will moir' James kennerty and Williame' quelp quhilk Riply awysit the gret
aitht suorne the Resonis of batht the said parteis herd' and vndirstandin deliuerit
and' fand be the moutht of the said Dauid menyes forspekar that the said Dauid'
theman and his wiff quyt of the wrangus' Intermitting' of the said petis ande
elding' And the said Jhone' Wormet was adiugit in amerciament of the court for of the
wrangus' borghe strekin apon' the said Dauid theman And his wiff et cetera

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xvjo die mensis octobris
Anno ut supra

the samyne day Jonet perfite convict' be ane assise for the
wrangus' spillinge of the merkat

The samyne day the saide Jonet oblist hyr be hyr awin tong' grante to pay
viij s' or for gevin gif scho beis fundin in the merkat byand meil or malt in
the merkat for yer and day

Eodem die Alexander de chamera Junior Inuenit alexandrum sanquhor plegium legalem
quod Johannes Wormet erit indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et Thomas de
camera inuenit alexandrum scroggis plegium legalem quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis
pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes Wormet inuenit villelmum Kyntor ple
gium legalem quod dictj alexander et thomas erunt indempnis indempnes pro eo aliter quam per
viam Juris et quelibet pars obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios indempnis
de huiusmodi sidicione per ostencionem manium

Actio mota per Johannem Wormet contra deliberacionem assise penes plegium
porrectum alias super Dauid theman et sponsam suam continuatur vsque ad aduentum prepositj
causa debilitatis curie

Thomas Knokkis oblist him be the fath of his body to gif xxiij fyddyr
of petis to thomen of mar nov at the hyll and he sall stake the laiff of
the said Thomas lityl keylfull at the myr And alson' as god will prouide
weddyr that thaj may be wonyne' he sall mak thame' Reddy and pay
the said thomas thankfully betuix this and' mertmes' and god' send weddir
tharto et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem vicesimo die
octoberis Anno Domini et cetera lxxxviijo

the samyn day the balyeis chargit Wile Wricht
to pay x s' of annuele to mastir Alexander fif acht to him of the Riggis of vmquhile
Richerd of Ruthirfurde of iiij yeris bigan becaus' the saide Williame grantit that
he occupeit the saide landis ande come souerte to him tharfor and to mak him pament
within terme of law and he was chargit be the officiar to Remane within the tolbutht quhile he pait
the samyn

Eodem die actiones debatabiles inter Johannem fechat et Alisonam giffarde
matrem suam ex vna et Johannem Waus filium et heredem quondam gilberti Waus
partibus ex altera continuatur cum consensu parcium vsque ad tridium post aduentum
dominj de Drvm ad domum ab edinburgo et tunc Justicia partibus ministrabitur
suis vlteriore dilacione

Eodem die Johannes Waus filius et heres quondam gilberti Waus fecit constituit
et creauit dominum Dauid Waus vicarium de banf Andream Cullane seniorem et
Johannem Waus fratrem dominum de many coniunctim et diuisim suos legitimos procuratores
ad prosequendum Johannem fechat pro iniusta detencione ab eo vnius capitali et
distinctione et iniusta intromissione vnius cimbe sibi pertinentis Et alisonam giffarde
pro certis bonis sibi tanquam Jure hereditario contingen' prout in actis de super prius
factis plenius continetur Et eadem bona recipiend' et inde acquitan' dand'
Promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus clausulis
necessariis et oportunis et cetera

the samyn day henry bawne grauntit him borghe' to Jhone low for ane
barrele of Salmonde quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law And thareftir the saide Jhone pait iij li' of golde to Jhone' moir'
for ane barrele of Salmonde

the samyn day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane assis Robert blinsele
forspekar that gilbert muresone sal content ande pay to Dauid spens viij s'
ande ix d' Ane boll ande half ane firlat of S gret salte Ande the
balyeis cause Duncane straloche officiar charge the saide gilbert be his
h'h' overwrites 'b?'.ande to pay the saidis money ande salte within terme of law

Eodem die continuatur actio processus ministri vsque in xxiiij diem et cetera causa debilitatis
curie mensis instantis

Eodem die balliui constituerunt officiarium ad capiendum plegios ab Andream lammyntone
et thoma Narne ad comparendum coram consulibus feria sexta proxime futura
sibi super certis iniuriis reponsurus contra communionem ordinacioni burgi

Eodem die Andreas branche primo die vocatus ad respondendum plegio super ipsum
per Johannem malisone porrecto pro iniusta detencione ab eo summe xvi s' g' et
viij g' non comparuit quare precipitur moricio byssat seriando capere districtum et
premunire eum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxiiijo die octoberis anno ut supra

head.add: meg the wyf of Jhon soutar

div.p:
The samyn day mege the wif of Jhone soutar conuikit be hir' tong grant for the
brekin of common' ordinance and spilling' of the mercat in bying of meile and sellinge
of saile cakis evile stuf and of litile quantite And to forber in tyme to cum And
gif scho be conuikit eftiruart in sic faltis scho salbe banist the tone

The saide day Williame ranisone in Amerciament of the court be his avne tong' graunt
for the wrvking' of lethir with his avne handis in contrar the law and statutez
of the gilde ande to amend as law wil and to forber in tyme to cum

The saide Williame in amerciament of the court be his avne tounge graunt for the biing'
of hidis vthir wais than the law levis to amende as law wile and' to forber
in tyme to cum

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Willelmus gregory est propin
quior et legittimus heres quondam Johannis gregory patris suj virtute cuiusdam
littere testimonialis ibidem product' de morte quondam Johannis gregory fratris suj

head.add: Judicio processus pro ministro domus sancte trinitatis

div.p:
Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per fratrem petrum stirueling' ministrum
domus Sancte trinitatis procuratorem et eo Nomine dicte domus super recuperacione
proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre sine ortiortu vasto Jacentis iuxta dictum locum
ex orientali parte cimiterij eiusdem et torrentem Sancte trinitatis ex australi
et cetera in defectu solucionis xxxti d' debit' annuatim dicto ministro et loco et a longo
tempore non solut' vnde dictus minister peciit a ballivis secundum formam sui processus
precedentis Juris et Justicie complementum Tunc curia mature auisiat' decreuit
quod dictus minister possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre legittime recuperauit
pro defectu solucionis xxx d' prenotat' et hoc ex ore Johannis tailyour' Judicatoris
curie pro Judicio fuit datum teste curia

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxvijo die octoberis
anno quosupra

Eodem die Andreas lamyntone et thomas narne fatebantur
se comburgenses dicti burgi et Juratos eidem

Eodem die Johannes barbour' conuictus fuit per assisam pro perturbio pauli
Cutlare et sibi emendabit ut iura volunt Et dictus paulus in amerciamento curie pro
perturbio dicti Johannis cum emendabit ut iura volunt et consequenter deliberatum
fuit per dictam assisam quod dictus Johannes persoluet prefato paulo quinque s' ad
emendam inde iij s' in manibus et vj d' qualibet ebdomita dummodo dicta summa
fuerit plenarie persolut'

Eodem die Johannes barbour' inuenit Dauid mar' plegium legalem quod paulus
cutlar et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sue aliter quam per viam
Juris Et dictus paulus inuenit Andream cadiow plegium legalem quod
dictus Johannes et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per
viam Juris
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die Nouembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Joneta cathnes sponsa
Willelmi blinsell est propinquior et legittima heres quondam Johannis
cathnes patris sui

Eodem die Dauid michelsone conuictus fuit per assisam pro perturbio Alexandri
fynne et pro emenda eiusdem dabit j li' cere ad lumen sancti sanguinis

Eodem die Willelmus philp conuictus fuit proer perturbio sponse Willelmi
gareache in verbo cui emendabit ut iura volunt

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis Williame of
Kyntor forspekar that androw Watsone sal sueir the gret aith' that he
bocht nocht iiij bovis fra thome the Waus nor condicionyt nocht him
siluer for thame thane he is quyt of his clame of his siluer and
he sale deliuer him the iiijor bovis als' gude as he tuk thaim fra
him

The samyn day the balyeis grantit to the deknys' of the
cordinouris that quhar' thai fynde vnlauchfule stuf amang the werk
mene of thar craft anys being' forbodyne the secunde tyme that gudis
vnlauchfule salbe present to the balyeis for iustice to be done tharapon'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xiiijto die nouembris anno quo supra

the quhilk day the aldirman and balyeis chargit Androu branche to pay to
Williame lutar' xl s' of his wattir maile of this martimes maile ande
terme last bigane

the samyn day it was fundin and previt In presens of the ballieis that Jhone Waus
sone and ayr to vmquhile gilbert Waus is pait of ale annuele of the lande of
Jhone fechatis in the vuerkirkgate of ale termes bigane to this day

The samyn day thome of mar grantit him avand xviii s' to Jonhne portar quhilk
the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

the samyn day Williame portar was conuikit be ane assise of thir personis vndir
writin that is to say Alexander menzeis Jhone colisone Androu murray thome
prat Wat of auchneyf Jonhe of glenmaluing Jonhe moire Jonhne grige Wat
thomson alexander nachty Robert prat Alexander sanchar ande Jonhe steuarte deliuerit
be the moutht of the saide Jonhe colison for' the strubulance of Androu branche the
bailye maliciouslie in worde and in Ane amerciament of the court tharfor Alsua the forsaide
Williame portar was conuikit be the saide assise for the strubulance of the saide bailye
in the execucione of his office ande in dispersoning of him And to Amend' it as
law wile Item the saide Williame portar was conuikit be the saide assise for the
strubulance of alexander allansone seriande in worde And' the saide bailye ande
officiar quyt of ale strubulance of the saide Williame portar

The samyn day It was statut ande ordanit be the aldirman ande consale for the
amendis of the saide strubulance batht the said partiis being' oblist to stand tharto
that the said Williame portar sal pas' to the tolbutht dure ande cum bene
bairhede to the common' kist ande besek the aldirman and the consale present for
the tyme to mak instance to Androw branche the bailye to remitt him
for the offence and strubulance done to him obefor And the said William to syt don'
one his knee ande ask the said bailye forgevynnis And' atour gif euire
the said Williame beis conuikit in tyme cumin for siclik offence he sale
pay to Sanct Nicholes' werk fiwe lib' vnforgiffin And' for this saide
offence now done to the saide bailye and seriande the said William sale
pay j pent of waxe to the haly blud licht tharof ij li' in continent And
the remanent to be pait at commavnd of the aldirman and iiij of consale quhen
euire he is Requirit tharto

The samyn day the aldirman and balyeis chargit Williame porter to fulfile
the ake and the ordinance contenit in it anent the mendis diuisit be
thame for the offence done to Androu branche the bailye ande to Sandy
allane the seriande as he that was promittit tharto be the fatht of his body
befor' the aldirman ande consale to vndirly thar' ordinance the quhilk the
saide Williame portar vtirly refusit ande walde nocht fulfile the samyn'

Eodem die Willelmus portar inuenit Willelmum mare seniorem plegium legalem quod andreas
branche et Alexander Allane erunt Indempnes et pars sua pro ipso et parte sua
aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus Andreas inuenit Johannem gilespy plegium
legalem quod dictus Willelmus et pars sua erunt indempnes pro eo aliter quam per
viam Juris et pro parte sua et quelibet dicta parcium fide media alter obligatur ad conseruandum
plegios suos Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvijo die nouembris Anno Domini
et cetera lxxxviijo

div.head: Inquisicio domini Dauid Waus et cetera
div.p:
Alexander chavmer de murchile dominus Johannes ruthirfurde magister Andreas cadiow Johannes
Knollis Alexander Rede Dauid menzeis senior Willelmus futhes Johannes Wormet
Andreas murray senior Andreas Wentone Walterus auchneyf Walterus
thomson' et villelmus lepar' Jurati dicunt quod ignorant de quibus terris aut
annuis redditibus quondam Robertus Waus auus domini Dauid Waus obiit
vestitus et sasitus set sciunt et dicunt quod dictus dominus Dauid est legittimus
et propinquior heres quondam dicti Roberti aui sui et quod est legittime etatis
ceteros punctos nesciunt deseruire quia non sunt terre datum et cetera

the samyn day Wat thomsone grantit him avande to alexander Jonhnesone in auchin
scleide xiiij s' And' quhat that the saide alexander ande ane leile man in his
hande walde suer' this day xv dais in presens of the aldirman and balyeis
in the tolbutht that the saide Walter was avande him mair' to pay to the
saide alexander

The samyn day the aldirman ballieis ande consaile present for the tyme has
grantit ane competent burges to be maide to Jonhne of buchan for his alde
seruice done to thame tymes bigane

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise that Androw Wentone sale
pay to mavnys Wormet iij s' and the said' Androw quyt of his clame the
quhilk the said Androw pait him in Jugement

Eodem die Robertus blinsele conuictus de clameo magnj Wormet de xi s' per
assisam

Eodem die Alisona giffarde et Johannes Waus fide media obligatur ad standum
et subeundum ordinacioni et decreto domini Dauid Waus curati de omnibus bonis
Jure heditario per dictum Johannem clamatis et aliis clameis quibuscumque

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vicesimo primo die nouembris anno
ut supra

the samyn day comperit Williame blinsele befor the aldirman
ande bailyeis as he that was warnit be the aldirman tharto ande presentit
certane pundis that he hed takin out of Williame moiris lande for ane
annuele Rent of viij s' and iiij d' aucht him of the martymes terme last bigan
And offerit him to vndirly ane decisione of the aldirman ande consale gif
he hed' done ony wrang in the takin of the said pundis In presens of the
said Williame moire quhilk maid nay ansuer tharto as that tyme

Eodem die Willelmus moire in Amerciamento Curie per confessionem proprie lingue pro
perturbio Willelmi blinsele in verbo et ad emendandum sibi vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes steuarte in Amerciamento curie pro perturbio henrici horum
et ad emendandum sibi vt iura volunt

The samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise Alexander chamer forspekar
that Will burges sal resaue fra Williame mydiltone the quhet that he
bocht fra him And the said William burges sale gif him xx s' in hand
and iiij li' at Sanct Nicholes' day next to cum And William mydiltone
sale gif him iij f' of quhet atour his first condicion to mak the quhet dry
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxiiij die nouembris Anno quo supra

quo die Willelmus colp et Robertus blinsele procuratores Agnetis colp et
margarete colp presentarunt preposito / thome de camera et andree culan ballivis vnum
breue compulsionis Suppremj domini nostri Regis de xviij li' clamatis super alexandrum matheson

the samyn day the aldirman ande ballieis with avys' of the haile court assignit
to James of Kintor friday that next cumis to ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit apon'
him be Dauid menyeis for the wranguys' withhaldin fra him of v barrelis of inglis quhet
with the mair iij barrelis of malt of the rest of gretar somes Ande the thridpart of twa
boytis of Romany wyne Siluer extending' to viij li' or' tharby

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxvjo
nouembris anno quo supra

the samyn day Alexander chamer of murchile fande a borghe'
in the handis of thomas Jamesone seriand that Jonhne colison burges of the said burghe ayr to
vmquhile Dauid colison aw to releif and freith' him of the profitis of ane half nethis fischingis
of the Raik of that yer' bigan or' of this instant' yer' be virteu of ane obligacion and contract mad
be vmquhile the said Dauid his fadir with the said alexander and vthiris to mastir Androw cadiow aprevand and
fulfilland the quhilk obligacion and contract the said Jhon' has assignit and gevin to the said mastir Androw his demi
nethis of the Raik as come to his cours' of the said obligacion and aw in likuis' during' al the termes contenit tharin
to freith me and wrangis that he doit nocht and thai assignit this day xv dais et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio primo die Decembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day the widew of Jonhne of cathnes grantit that mastir Androw
crab put the saide Jonhne in possessione of ane annuele rent of tene s'
of the lande of Jonhne fechat liand in the schipraw

The samyn day the aldirman ande ballieis assignit this day xv dais to
mastir themane crab to comper befor thame ande ordanit his modir
to warne him tharto to schew his defens' anent the landis ande annuele
rentis clamyt be Williame blinsele one hys wyffis behalf be the deces'
of hir saide fadir schevinge to him quethir he comper or nocht thai wile do iustice

The samyn day the aldirman ande ballieis assignit tuysday cum aucht dais
to Dauid michelsone to Ansuer to ane borghe' strekit apone him be patrik
baxtar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xviii s' and x d' as day of
peremptour

the samyn day the aldirman ande ballieis assignit
tuysday at cum aucht dais to Androu ranison to ansuer tile ane borghe'
strekit apone him be thomas quhit for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
xxiij s' as day of peremptour And in likuis' to the said thomas to
Anesuer to ane borghe' strekit be the saide Androw for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of xvij s' as day of peremptour

Eodem die Dauid menyeis senior et Jacobus Kintor fide media obligarunt
se fide media ad standum et subeundum constitucioni et ordinacioni prepositi et Alexandri
chavmer de murchile et trium personarum per ipsos eligendos penes clamea inter
huiusmodi partes debatabiles quecumque

Eodem die Johannes nicholsone constituit Johannem talyour suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum et recipiendum
xj s' monete scocie ab eodem fraudulenter recept' et cetera in vberiore forma procuratorij et inde
acquitand' et cetera
